text: Kumji Ka Parda is a village in Banswara district of Rajasthan state of India . Singer Satkeer studied in Government Senior Secondary School of village Kumji Ka Parda. Wagdi , Keer's language and Hindi language are spoken in this village . ==Famous People == * Satkeer ==References== *Lonely Planet Rajasthan, Delhi & Agra," Michael Benanav, Abigail Blasi, Lindsay Brown, Lonely Planet, 2017, *Berlitz Pocket Guide Rajasthan," Insight Guides, Apa Publications (UK) Limited, 2019, ==Other websites== *https://g.co/kgs/BzpwMnD? Category:Villages in Rajasthan
title: Kumji Ka Parda
